meta.title: Dynamic Placeholder Image Generator - Customizable & Free
meta.description: Generate custom placeholder images on-the-fly for your web projects. Fast, flexible, and free API for developers and designers. Supports PNG, JPEG, WebP.
meta.keywords: placeholder image, dynamic image, image generator, web development, design tools, free API, customizable image, dummy image, Next.js placeholder, google placeholder

hero.title: Your Ultimate Placeholder Image Solution
hero.description: Generate dynamic and customizable placeholder images for your web projects with ease. Fast, flexible, and free.

customizable.title: Highly Customizable
customizable.description: Adjust dimensions, background, text color, and image format to perfectly match your design needs.

fast.title: Blazing Fast
fast.description: Our API delivers images instantly, ensuring your development workflow remains smooth and efficient.

flexible.title: Flexible Formats
flexible.description: Choose between PNG, JPEG, and WebP to optimize image quality and file size for any use case.

callToAction.title: Ready to Simplify Your Workflow?
callToAction.description: Start generating beautiful placeholder images in seconds. No sign-up required!

hero.title: Dynamic Placeholder Image Generator
hero.description: Generate custom placeholder images on-the-fly with customizable dimensions, colors, and formats.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Get started with a simple API call to generate your first placeholder image.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Control dimensions, colors, and output format with URL parameters.

formats.title: Multiple Formats
formats.description: Support for PNG, JPEG, and WebP image formats.

parameters.title: API Parameters
parameters.description: All parameters are optional and passed as URL query parameters.
